name: John Boyce
bio: John Boyce, the fearless strategist on the greens, has a knack for reading the course like a book. Known for his calm demeanor, he's a natural leader who rallies his team with quiet confidence. His favorite post-round ritual is sipping on an Arnold Palmer while analyzing the day’s play.
prediction: John will dominate the fairways and inspire his team with consistent play, although his tendency to overthink might cost him a few strokes under pressure.

name: Jimmy Boyce
bio: Jimmy Boyce, affectionately known as 'Duck,' is the life of any golf outing. With an infectious laugh and a killer swing, he’s as entertaining as he is talented. Off the course, he’s the grill master everyone loves.
prediction: Jimmy’s power drives will steal the show, but a few errant shots might ruffle his feathers. Expect a blend of brilliance and hilarity.

name: Eric Hall
bio: Eric 'Hammer' Hall is the powerhouse of the group, known for his long drives that often leave others in awe. A perfectionist at heart, he spends hours perfecting his short game.
prediction: Eric’s drives will give his team an early advantage, though a few risky shots could land him in the rough.

name: John Snow
bio: John 'Frosty' Snow is a cool and calculated player who thrives under pressure. Known for his signature fade shot, he’s the guy you want on your team when the stakes are high.
prediction: John’s steady hand will help his team recover from tricky situations, but a love for fancy shots might add a few unnecessary strokes.

name: Brian Cregan
bio: Brian 'Bri' Cregan has a flair for the dramatic, often pulling off miraculous recovery shots. His charismatic personality makes him a favorite in the clubhouse.
prediction: Brian will rally his team with his positivity, though occasional overconfidence could lead to some wild swings.

name: Andy McDonald
bio: Andy 'Mac' McDonald is a tactical genius who meticulously plans every shot. His analytical approach makes him a valuable asset to any team.
prediction: Andy’s sharp focus will keep his team on track, though he may need to loosen up to enjoy the game more.

name: Dan Hamilton
bio: Dan 'Ham' Hamilton is the fun-loving joker of the group, always ready with a witty remark. Despite his humor, he takes his golf seriously when it counts.
prediction: Dan will keep morale high with his jokes, but his short game might need some extra attention.

name: Chris Troyan
bio: Chris 'Troy' Troyan is a reliable player who excels in high-pressure situations. His smooth swing and calm demeanor make him a consistent performer.
prediction: Chris’s consistency will earn his team valuable points, though he might struggle with longer putts.

name: Brian Skilton
bio: Brian 'Skilz' Skilton is known for his impeccable technique and deep understanding of the game. A true student of golf, he’s always learning and improving.
prediction: Brian’s precision will keep his team in contention, but his cautious approach might miss a few daring opportunities.

name: Steve Higbee
bio: Steve 'Higs' Higbee is a natural athlete with a competitive edge. His ability to adapt to any course condition makes him a formidable opponent.
prediction: Steve will shine on the back nine, but his aggressive play might lead to a few risky decisions.

name: Bill Tuefel
bio: Bill 'Billy' Tuefel is the seasoned veteran of the group, bringing years of experience and wisdom to the game. His calm and steady play is an inspiration to younger players.
prediction: Bill will deliver a masterclass in course management, though his conservative style might leave him trailing on long drives.

name: Tony Marandola
bio: Tony 'T-Man' Marandola is a powerhouse off the tee, with drives that often leave others speechless. He’s also known for his hilarious banter on the course.
prediction: Tony’s humor will keep his team entertained, but he may need to work on his putting under pressure.

name: Brian Cusick
bio: Brian 'Cuse' Cusick is a precision player with a penchant for reading greens like a pro. His attention to detail is unmatched.
prediction: Brian will sink some clutch putts, but overanalyzing might slow down his game.

name: Frank O'Neill
bio: Frank 'Frankie' O'Neill is a crowd favorite with his jovial personality and surprising shot-making ability. His laugh is infectious.
prediction: Frank will keep his team laughing, though consistency may elude him on long holes.

name: Brian McCollum
bio: Brian 'Mack' McCollum is a scrappy player who thrives in challenging conditions. No obstacle is too big for him to overcome.
prediction: Brian will be a clutch performer on tough lies, though a tendency to experiment might backfire occasionally.

name: Nick Markley
bio: Nick 'Marko' Markley is a steady performer who lets his clubs do the talking. He’s the definition of 'cool under pressure.'
prediction: Nick’s reliability will make him a captain’s dream pick, but he might struggle to dazzle on big stages.

name: Paul Philson
bio: Paul 'Philly' Philson is a wildcard with the potential for greatness. When he’s on, he’s unstoppable.
prediction: Paul will provide flashes of brilliance, though consistency could be a challenge on longer holes.

name: Mark Rowles
bio: Mark 'Rowley' Rowles is a laid-back player who makes the game look easy. His effortless swing is a joy to watch.
prediction: Mark will play with grace and poise, though he might lack the urgency needed for high-stakes shots.

name: Sam Novak
bio: Sam 'Slam' Novak is the power hitter of the group, often outdriving his peers by a mile. His go-big-or-go-home attitude is iconic.
prediction: Sam will dominate the par-5s, but risky plays could cost him on tight fairways.

name: Noel Morning
bio: Noel 'EarlyBird' Morning is the early riser who brings energy and enthusiasm to every round. He’s the team’s motivational speaker.
prediction: Noel will set the tone with a strong start, but maintaining momentum might prove challenging by the back nine.
